ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] LIZARDS ARE CUTE
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL, Rose.  I even went to Comp USA today, since it was to hit retail shelves.  HAHAHAHA!!!  Nope, they haven t gotten THEIR order in either ;-(.  The good
ygData.messageBody:
LOL, Rose.  I even went to Comp USA today, since it was to hit retail shelves.  HAHAHAHA!!!  Nope, they haven't gotten THEIR order in either ;-(.  The good news is I FINALLY got all the way through to getting to hold at the 800 number.  This after 3 days of calling, once getting through to be told "everyone will get their order" and then hung up on.

Oh, and just called.  They have no record of my order.  However, I cannot order again because I've already ordered and no, the shipping company people can't do anything, I have to call Sony.  But, of course, Sony can't do anything I have to call the shipping company.

Sorry, this IS a rant.  I have had a lot of respect for Verant in the past, but the way they have handled Kunark is totally and completely unacceptable.  A valuable lesson in how NOT to handle customer support.

Ice

Rose M Glass wrote:

 
I have yet to see one.  Have not gotten my CD yet, *looks out the door
to see if the UPS guy has spawned*
